title: American Banker Names Eight Citi Executives to Most Powerful Women in Banking List
summary: Today, the American Banker named eight Citi executives to this year's Most Powerful Women in Banking Lists - a record for any one bank in a single year! Celebrating its 10th anniversary, The Most Powerful Women in Banking list highlights 25 of the most powerful women in banking, 25 women to watch and the 25 most powerful women in finance.
tag-1: American Banker Names Eight Citi Executives to Most Powerful Women in Banking List

tag-4: Congratulations to our colleagues on this wonderful recognition.
